title: Universe/Frames/AxesOrient
description: Configuration for Stations points/axes in frames plugin

source.description: Stations source (i.e. name of a databased loaded in the universe)

axes.description: Optional boolean flag to load stations axes into frames

points.description: Optional boolean flag to load stations points into frames

stationsCorrection.description: Optional array with station coordinates corrections map

axes.description: Axes frame for the coordinates correction model

correction.description: Station coordinates correction vector (three distances in km)

lorentz.description: Optional boolean flag to apply Lorentz corrections to the station coordinates

tides.description: Optional array with tide models. NOTE: currently only a single model can be activated.

active.description: Boolean flag to specify if model is active or not

model.description: Name of the tides model. NOTE: currently only 'solidEarth' is supported

ephem.description: Name of ephemerides to be used in the tides model
